instructions.2: Wash sweet potatoes and pat dry. Prick with a fork, place in a shallow baking dish, and bake at 400 degrees for 40 to 50 minutes or until soft.
instructions.3: During the last 10 minutes of baking, prepare sauce. Melt CRISCO® in a medium saucepan (or place oil in saucepan). Add brown sugar, salt, orange juice, and water, stirring over low heat until sugar dissolves. Add cranberries; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer covered for 5 minutes or until cranberries start to pop.
instructions.4: Stir cornstarch mixture into cranberries; cook, stirring constantly, until sauce comes to a boil. Reduce heat and cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until mixture is slightly thickened.
instructions.5: Make a lengthwise cut in the center of each potato; press open from bottom. Place sweet potatoes on a serving platter. Top each with cranberry sauce.
